name: Ricetta: granchio dorato
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Golden Crab.

value.name: Uovo d'uccello
value.desc: An incredibly versatile ingredient that can supply all of your daily protein needs.

value.name: Farina
value.desc: A powder ground from wheat. No matter what it goes into, it brings a sense of satisfaction to the diner.

value.name: Granchio
value.desc: Un crostaceo che vive accanto all'oceano. La sua deliziosa carne friabile pu√≤ essere utilizzata per preparare dei piatti appetitosi.

value.name: Sale
value.desc: A savory seasoning. A precise but adequate amount will elevate the quality of the cuisine.

value.name: Granchio dorato
value.desc: A crab dish cooked in the ancient ways. The crab has been chopped into pieces and battered with flour, before being stir-fried till golden and rich with flavor. It is worthy of the word "gold," whether in terms of appearance or quality.

value.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Obtained from Mona's Story Quest: Act I "Beyond the World's Stars"</color>
